Mac App Store Preview

This app is available only on the App Store for iPhone, iPad, and Mac.

#  AI Writer  4+

##  Jasper AI Powered Copy Writer

##  Aryan Chaurasia

  *     * 4.5 • 137 Ratings

  *     * Free
    * Offers In-App Purchases

## Screenshots

  * Mac 
  * iPhone 
  * iPad 

  *   * 

## Description

Jasper-Copywriter for your everyday task

  

AI Writer is a powerful writing tool that uses artificial intelligence to
improve the quality of your writing. With AI Writer, you can easily create
well-written, error-free documents in a fraction of the time it would take to
do it manually. This is better and affordable compared to Jasper AI, Copy AI,
Rytr, etc and does everything like other apps. This app lets you write any
type of text can also use it to chat. But that's not all - AI Writer also
comes with a keyboard extension that allows you to generate AI-powered content
on any app, directly from your keyboard. Simply type out your prompt and let
AI Writer do the rest.

  

It's your Essay Writer, blog generator, article writer and a tool for
Paraphrase, Rephrase, Copywriter. Whether you're a busy professional looking
to save time on writing or a content creator in need of inspiration, AI Writer
has you covered. Try it out today and experience the power of AI-generated
content.

  

The AI technology behind AI Writer is designed to assist you in every step of
the writing process, from brainstorming and organizing your thoughts to
checking for grammar and spelling errors. It even provides suggestions for
alternative words and phrases to help improve the overall clarity and
coherence of your writing.

  

In addition to its AI-powered writing assistance, AI Writer also offers a
range of useful features to help you produce professional-quality documents.
These include a customizable interface that allows you to tailor the tool to
your specific needs.

  

Whether you're a student, a business professional, or a writer by trade, AI
Writer is an invaluable tool that can help you produce high-quality, error-
free documents in no time. With AI Writer, you can write with confidence,
knowing that your writing is clear, concise, and free of errors. So, it is a
must-have tool for anyone who wants to improve their writing skills and
produce better, more polished work. You can also use it like chat while using
AI engine for ai writing.

##  Ratings and Reviews

See All

4.5 out of 5

137 Ratings

137 Ratings

FEY_29_415_158  ,  08/30/2023

###  Polished Writings with Style, Fluidity, and Subtleties That Elevates Your
Document

> I am a good writer. This app is a great one. I write my thoughts, use
> adjectives and adverbs, then provide the prompt with the type of document,
> tone, and circumstances the writing needs to convey. Each and every time, I
> am AMAZED! Try it. You’ll be impressed!
>
> more

DenJ77  ,  04/23/2023

###  Great

> One of the best and fastest I have tested so far. Outstanding customer
> service. I would like to see a cleaner interface, SEO support and a
> plagerism checker. If this was added it would seriously be a force to be
> reckoned with.
>
> more

eliHK564  ,  02/08/2023

###  Amazing app and potential

> This app works amazing, but it’s fair to note it’s on the early stages of
> development so there’s a few hiccups but the amount I did see of it was far
> better in comparison to all the other AI writer apps I’ve seen on this app.
> I hope things stabilize out soon and so it can be throughly enjoyed before I
> commit fully.
>

##  App Privacy

See Details

The developer, Aryan Chaurasia, indicated that the app’s privacy practices may
include handling of data as described below. For more information, see the
developer’s privacy policy.

### Data Linked to You

The following data may be collected and linked to your identity:

  * Contact Info

Privacy practices may vary, for example, based on the features you use or your
age. Learn More
